rocky.teatime.database.TeaStuff

Class Tea

  • java.lang.Object
    • rocky.teatime.database.TeaStuff.Tea

  • public class Tea
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information that a tea drinker might find of interest!

      • createTeaRemoveAlert

        public void createTeaRemoveAlert(android.content.Context activityContext)
        Asks the user if they are sure to remove the tea from the data base. This method only handles the display of the alert, the actual heavy lifting is done on the onPositiveButton() method
        Parameters:
        activityContext - The application context of the current activity

      • removeDBEntry

        private void removeDBEntry()
        Removes the database entry corresponding to this Tea object

      • readFromBundle

        public static Tea readFromBundle(android.os.Bundle someBundle)
        Reads a tea object from a json string that has been serialised using Gson.
        Parameters:
        someBundle - The bundle of extras containing the tea object
        Returns:
        Returns a fully instantiated tea object corresponding to the json object. If the bundle does not have a JSON tea object attached then it will simply return a non initialised tea object.

        Returns:

      • getColourDark

        public int getColourDark()
        Returns a darker variant of the colour corresponding with the type of tea this is. This darker colour is mostly used to colour the status bar.
        Returns:
        Id of the darker variant of the colour associated with the tea in quwstion

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object otherObject)
        Checks for equality between two tea objects
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        otherObject - Object with which we wish to compare our tea object
        Returns:
        True if the two teas have the same name, type, brewing parameters and picture, false otherwise.
